name: PenicillinAllergyIntolerance
title: Penicillin Allergy Intolerance
purpose: (Clinical Focus: SNOMED CT codes and RxNORM codes that could be returned by the FHIR Allergy Intolerance resource, and would indicate allergy or intolerance to Penicillin antibiotics),(Data Element Scope: ALLERGY_INTOLERANCE: Penicillin),(Inclusion Criteria: RxNORM codes for individual medications that are Penicillin antibiotics, and various SNOMED CT codes that would indicate allergy or intolerance to Penicillin antibiotics as a class, or individual Penicillin antibiotics),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
